title: Google confirms Nest doorbells and cameras wonâ€™t charge in freezing temperatures
content:
If you have observed that your Nest Doorbell is taking ages to charge or not charging at all during harsh winter months, you’re not alone. It seems the new battery-powered Nest Doorbell and Nest Cam are unable to work properly in freezing temperatures. Google is aware of this shortcoming of Nest products and has provided

The post Google confirms Nest doorbells and cameras won’t charge in freezing temperatures appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google has confirmed that at temperatures below freezing, the battery of your Nest Doorbell or camera won't charge.
